name: SF Homeowner Assistance Fund
description: Up to $80,000 for past-due mortgage, property tax, HOA, and utilities for SF homeowners
fullDescription: The SF Homeowner Assistance Fund helps income-eligible San Francisco homeowners who experienced pandemic-related hardship catch up on mortgage payments, property taxes, and other housing costs.
whatTheyOffer:
- Past-due mortgage payment assistance
- Property tax payment assistance
- HOA/condo dues assistance
- Utility payment assistance
- Up to $80,000 in assistance
howToGetIt:
1. Must own and occupy home in San Francisco
2. Must be at or below 150% of area median income
3. Must have COVID-related financial hardship after January 2020
4. Must be at least 1 month behind on eligible expense
5. Apply online or with housing counseling agency
keywords: homeowner assistance, mortgage help, foreclosure prevention, San Francisco, property tax, HOA, utility, delinquent
